title: The toughest competition for the latest and greatest AirPods is from Apple
content:
AirPods 3 launched last October. With a brand new design, Spatial Audio technology, and a $50 price increase, these wireless earbuds try to bring the original AirPods experience to another level. But are they as magical as the first version was?

moreâ€¦

The post The toughest competition for the latest and greatest AirPods is from Apple appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: AirPods 3 have a brand new design, Spatial Audio technology, and more battery. But are they as magical as the first version was?
